author: Ben Kesslen
title: Kentucky lawyer arrested for allegedly threatening governor over lockdown
description: Attorney James Gregory Troutman allegedly said on Facebook that he hopes Gov. Andy Beshear would see the same fate as a former governor, William Goebel, who was assassinated in 1900.
content:
A Kentucky lawyer was arrested for alleged online threats against the states governor, who has come under fire over his coronavirus lockdown.
James Gregory Troutman, 53, was charged with terroristic threatening, a misdemeanor, by the Kentucky State Police fo… [+1778 chars]
